title: [ad] Make My Logo Bigger Cream
content:
Absolutely realistic, totally nuts, visit :  
 [http://www.makemylogobiggercream.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907033811/http:/www.makemylogobiggercream.com/ "http://www.makemylogobiggercream.com")

 [‹ HTF Gestalt](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907033811/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38848 "Go to previous forum topic") [Linda, Are you old enough to drink today? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907033811/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38691 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Alessandro Segalini

comments.content: Yeah, but why doesn’t the Emotionator turn all those cold heartless sans serif fonts into beautiful scripts, or even better, the proven heartwarming friendliness of Comic Sans?
Better not send that link to the clients, or you’ll be out of work by the end of the week.
better design through science. it’s about time.
It’s unrelated to the magical cream as far as I know, but the song Make the Logo Bigger is worthy of a listen too if you enjoy this kind of things.
Reminds me a bit of enormicom.com and the Millennium Orbital Crescent Swish from back in the boom days.
